publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4144 Brian Adam: Dyce Boys Club Scottish Cup Winners—That the Parliament congratulates Dyce Boys Club under-14s on their 3-2 extra time victory over Leith Athletic in the Scottish Youth Football Association under-14s cup final; notes the recent success of north-east teams in the competition; believes that this demonstrates the strength of coaching and playing abilities in the north east of Scotland, and hopes that such success will continue for the foreseeable future. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S3M-4144 Brian Adam: Dyce Boys Club Scottish Cup Winners—That the Parliament congratulates Dyce Boys Club under-14s on their 3-2 extra time victory over Leith Athletic in the Scottish Youth Football Association under-14s cup final; notes the recent success of north-east teams in the competition; believes that this demonstrates the strength of coaching and playing abilities in the north east of Scotland, and hopes that such success will continue for the foreseeable future.
S3M-4144 Dyce Boys Club Scottish Cup Winners (lodged on 14 May 2009) Alison McInnes*
